ID_696.Title: Parameters of the "Send e-mail" button, do not send data to e-mail when the data is entered correctly
ID_696.STR: : 1. Open the APP 2.Fill in the field with the data to send 3. Tap “Send Email” button
ID_696.AR: : App return different links not related to sending email
ID_696.ER: : App return links related to sending emai
